summary: Ling Wu Chung decides to hide from the chaotic world. Before leaving, he visits his friends, a tribe of snake-wielding women warriors. However, he finds that the tribe have been attacked, and their leader Yam Ying Ying has been abducted.
cast: Jet Li|Brigitte Lin|Michelle Reis|Waise Lee|Rosamund Kwan|Kar Lok Chin|On-On Yu|Fennie Yuen|Shi-Kwan Yen|Shun Lau|Kwok Leung Cheung|Kwok-Ping Choi|Man-Kwong Fung|Choi-Chow Hoh|Yeung-Wah Kam|Chi Yeung Wong|Wai Shun Wong
keywords: chinese actor playing japanese character|cult leader|based on novel|beheading|cult
title: Swordsman II
